name: TikTok Video Indirme Botu
description: TikTok videolarını filigran olmadan indirmek için bir Telegram botu

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot Bot Token, get this value from @BotFather.

API_KEY.description: Your APP API KEY, get this from https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your APP HASH, get this from https://my.telegram.org

CHANNEL_URL.description: URL of your Telegram channel link.

BOT_URL.description: Username of your Telegram Bot (without @). Example: Tiktokdowloadxbot

WORKERS.description: Number of threads to use, this depends on usage.  4 is the recommended (and default) amount, but your experience may vary.
